column2: an A.M. Eatery////Hash Browns were so incredibly flavorful. The breakfast pot pie was so good. The sausage gravy had a nice peppery
column4: and the pie crust was flaky. I was a little bit disappointed in the mimosa because it didn't taste strong enough
column5: but I can look past that because our server was so friendly. I had a good experience here. I went on a Wednesday for brunch
column7: and the food came out promptly. There's limited parking in the adjacent lot
column8: so your best bet is parking somewhere on the side streets.
